template.p: This Business setup for Electronics store where they can sell their electronics items like Home Appliances, Kitchen Appliances, etc...
Customers are either visiting the store to discover new products, either exploring the webshop looking for great offers and discounts / cheapest costs,.
They generally require the functionalities of several apps to manage their business workflow.
Let's buy some items that are tracked by serial numbers.

ul.li: Create the purchase order
Select product LG Dual Inverter Window Air Conditioner
Confirm the RFQ
Validate the Receipt

template.p: When selling electronics, most items are tracked with serial numbers. To deliver the installation service, we use the project management app, with one task per installation to do.

ul.li: product: LG Dual Inverter Window Air Conditioner
product: Air Conditioner Installation
payment term: 30 % Advance Rest on Installment

template.blockquote: To speed up the creation of the quotation, use a quotation template.

ul.li: Odoo will generate 1 task for the Air Conditioner installation.
The delivery order will be created for the LG Dual Inverter
The salesperson sets the "expected delivery date" based on customer availability

template.p: Every day, the logistic manager reserves products that should be delivered today (reservation is set to manual for this location, so that he has a control of what he wants to send today). If a delivery order should be delivered today but products are not available, he informs the customer using the chatter on the delivery order.
Then, the worker processes all delivery orders that are ready, using the barcode interface. From delivery orders:

ul.li: Click on the first delivery order
Scan product LG Dual Inverter Window Air Conditioner
Scan the serial number
Click the "validate" barcode
